sn45.70:1.2: “Mendicants, one thing helps give rise to the noble eightfold path.
sn45.70:1.5: A mendicant with good friends can expect to develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
sn45.70:1.6: And how does a mendicant with good friends develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
sn45.70:1.7: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.70:1.8: That’s how a mendicant with good friends develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
